title: Budget 2026: How India’s inflation evolved over the past year
description: Budget 2026: A comprehensive look at India’s inflation trajectory over the last year ahead of Budget 2026, shows that India's economic narrative is shaped by a disinflationary trend, with both retail and wholesale price indices softening significantly. This s…
content: Inflation trends in FY26 have set the tone for the economic narrative ahead of Budget 2026, charting a road to disinflation in India. Both retail and wholesale price indices softened through the year… [+3446 chars]
